author: Zach Lewis
title: CNYSPCA: Increase in Cruelty Seizures at Shelter that Serves Oneida and Madison Counties | Local | wktv.com
text: UTICA, N.Y. (WKTV) -- According to the CNYSPCA, there has been an increase in the number of animals coming to the shelter through dog control and animal cruelty cases. CNYSPCA points to the increases in foreclosures, evictions and living situations as reasons that could contribute to the upward trend. “The number of animals being surrendered, dumped or found in unsafe and unclean conditions is increasing rapidly,” Troy Waffner, director of CNYSPCA, said. “Unfortunately," Waffner continued, "the picture it is painting is not a pretty one for our most vulnerable pets as their families are being displaced by changes in their lives and living situations.” The shelter said that there has been an 85 percent increase in the number of animals seized through its cruelty investigations. Additionally, there has been a 16 percent increase in the number of animals picked up as strays through dog control. “The almost doubling of cruelty seizures in one year is a travesty – the cases we saw this year ranged from hoarding to physical abuse on pets,” Waffner said. “It breaks your heart but also causes you to really focus on the question of what is causing the increase and how do we stop the cycle of abuse.” They have seen an 11 percent increase in adoptions recently, which can be attributed largely to their improved marketing efforts. “The silver lining in all of this is that we have been working harder than ever to place all of these animals, and we are seeing the results of that as there has been an increase in adoptions of all of our animals going into loving new forever homes,” Waffner said. In 2023, the shelter saw 303 surrenders, 404 seized animals and the intake of 537 strays. There were 958 adoptions this year. “Looking ahead to 2024, there are things we can do to try to help the situation including offering low cost spay/neuter programs, vaccination programs, microchipping and more to try to help pet owners who want to keep their animals but may not be able to afford all of the needed services a pet requires,” Waffner said. CNYSPCA, which was founded in 1891, serves all of Madison and Oneida counties. For more information on the CNYSPCA, [click here](https://cnyspca.org/).

author: 小浪财讯
title: 红利ETF博时（515890）跌0.79%，半日成交额562.03万元|博时_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，红利ETF博时（515890）跌0.79%，报1.382元，成交额562.03万元。红利ETF博时（515890）重仓股方面， 中远海控 截止午盘跌1.59%， 冀中能源 跌1.74%， 海澜之家 跌2.82%， 宁波华翔 涨0.19%， 山煤国际 跌1.03%， 唐山港 涨0.25%， 重庆百货 跌1.22%， 山西焦煤 跌2.32%， 中谷物流 跌0.84%， 潞安环能 跌1.82%。

author: Adrija Dey
title: Nanoplastics can make you anxious: Study shows impact on mood and behaviour | Health - Hindustan Times
text:
Nanoplastics are infinitesimally small plastic fragments, which are not visible to the naked eye and measure less than 1 micrometre in diameter. Since these particles are so small, they can be found in the human biological system, from the bloodstream to organs. A study published in the journal Neuroscience examined how these nanoplastics interfere with brain development and social behaviour.
Nanoplastics when found in the brain's dopamine-related areas like the prefrontal cortex and amygdala can make one anxious. (Shutterstock) ALSO READ: Paying with plastic: How microplastics are changing our world
Understanding nanoplastic’s effect
Nanoplastics are very small and cannot be seen by naked eye.(Shutterstock) The researchers examined the effect of nanoplastics on mice’s brains and behaviour. They exposed the nanoplastics to pregnant mice at different developmental stages. The mice were first given nanoplastics while still developing in the womb, then as babies, and eventually during early adulthood. During the experiments, their behaviour and brain activity were evaluated. The researchers found that the timing of when the mice were exposed to the nanoplastics was important. Based on when the mice were exposed to the nanoplastics, they showed very different reactions.
Different reactions Mice that were exposed to nanoplastics during late pregnancy or early adulthood, had trouble with social behaviour. Unfamiliar places would make them anxious and even freeze, showing very high signs of distress. The researchers also found that these mice exhibited reduced social familiarity, meaning they were less engaged with other mice and didn’t interact in a normal, comfortable way. These mice were very anxious.
For these mice, the brain activity in dopamine-related areas was disrupted. Dopamine is one of the hormones that regulate mood and behaviour. It is often called the ‘happy hormone.’ This may be the reason why they become anxious.
Whereas, the mice exposed to nanoplastics during the middle of pregnancy didn’t move as much and had very slow movements. Those mice exposed to nanoplastics during adolescence had more brain activity but didn't show noticeable changes in their behaviour like the ones exposed at other developmental stages.
The result is significant as it shows how dangerous nanoplastics can be. These little fragments can enter the body, even during sensitive periods like pregnancy. This has long-term consequences as they may disrupt brain functions related to mood, social interactions and even movements.
Disclaimer: This article is for informational purposes only and not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always seek the advice of your doctor with any questions about a medical condition.
ALSO READ: Plastic production to hit 1.1 billion tons by 2050: Study raises alarm on health risks from microplastics

En cuanto a sus derechos:
Libertad de movimiento: Los israelíes en Irán tienen severas restricciones de movimiento. Las sinagogas están sujetas a vigilancia y no se permite la proselitización.Propiedad: No pueden poseer propiedades en Irán.Educación: No pueden asistir a universidades públicas.Empleo: Se les restringe el acceso a la mayoría de los trabajos.En general, los israelíes en Irán son considerados ciudadanos de segunda clase y son objeto de discriminación por parte del gobierno.
Pasaporte:
Debido a que no se les permite tener la ciudadanía iraní, los israelíes en Irán no pueden obtener un pasaporte iraní. En cambio, deben usar un pasaporte extranjero para viajar.
Uno diría que los Iraníes tratan a los Israelíes en Irán de la misma manera que Israel trata a los Israelíes musulmanes en Israel.
en menor medida, el futbol y la politica. hay veces que la gente busca cualquier excusa para odiarte. en meneame muchos empiezan sus respuestas atribuyendote un color politico para proceder a soltar bilis.
La religión es un elemento identitario más. En nuestro instinto está el de pertenecer a un grupo con el que luchar por recursos y defendernos de otros grupos.
Religión, raza, idioma, folclore, son muchas cosas las que si bien en principio pueden no tener un impacto negativo, sí que sirven para reforzar esos vínculos y luchar contra un enemigo.
Que no estoy en contra ni creo positivo unificar todo en una misma cultura. Pero es obvio que sirve para marcar límites definir bandos y motivar a una sociedad hacia la confrontación.

author: Sefi García
title: Si buscas empleo, cuidado con lo que publicas en redes sociales
text:
Si buscas empleo, cuidado con lo que publicas en redes sociales
Siete de cada 10 responsables de contratación en las empresas consulta las redes sociales de los candidatos a un puesto de trabajo
Publicado el - Actualizado
4 min lectura
La imagen digital que proyectamos es muy importante para conseguir empleo....o para ser descartado.
Puede que nunca lo sepas, pero ese trabajo al que aspirabas y del que te descartaron puede tener que ver con la imagen que das en tus redes sociales. 4 de cada 10 aspirantes a un empleo fueron rechazados por sus perfiles públicos en redes sociales.
Para los empleadores es un complemento más en los procesos de selección “porque igual que el papel lo aguanta todo, pues un currículum también y entonces la parte de redes sociales da muchísima más información de un candidato que solamente un currículum”, nos cuenta La experta en Recursos Humanos Pilar Llácer. Por eso existen ya logaritmos que las rastrean cuando aplicas a un empleo.
¿QUÉ NO DEBEMOS HACER?
No hagas reflexiones sobre política, religión o ideología en tus redes sociales. No lo harán en la entrevista de trabajo y, por tanto, tampoco debes hacerlo en redes sociales. Es una de las razones por las que no te darán el trabajo para el 35% de los responsables de Recursos Humanos. Cuidado con las fotos que publicas. La mitad de los empleadores las tendrán muy en cuenta, aunque la investigadora y escritora nos asegura que “una imagen en una fiesta, por ejemplo, depende de la fiesta, hay las fiestas que te mueres y no puedes ni abrir los ojos, pues no vas a subir esa foto, pero ¿por qué va a ser malo una foto de una fiesta o una foto tomándote un vino? Al final es tratar todo de una forma coherente y de una forma que no nos vaya a perjudicar ni las fotos o ninguno de los textos que nosotros pensemos”.
Escribe bien los textos. Tener faltas de ortografía echan para atrás a 4 de cada 10 empleadores, y las faltas de respeto o los insultos hacia los demás, en la misma medida. Uno de cada 4 no tolera que se hable mal de los compañeros o de la empresa igual que las opiniones radicales.
¿CÓMO DEBEMOS REFLEJARNOS?
Además de evitar insultos, opiniones radicales, pensamientos sobre ideología y fotos que nos puedan comprometer, Llácer nos aconseja hacer publicaciones relacionadas con nuestro campo laboral, por ejemplo “quiero trabajar en el sector farmacéutico o en una posición determinada, pues al final lo que se busca ver es qué interés tiene ese candidato en ese sector o en esa posición. Publicar lo que me gusta trabajar en este sector o cosas relacionadas con el sector, eso da bastantes puntos más a un candidato. Insisto, ahora todos los algoritmos de inteligencia artificial también están priorizando. En LinkedIn hay un algoritmo que prioriza si el candidato sigue a la empresa en la que está aplicando a un proceso, pues ese candidato está por encima de no otro candidato que no siga a la empresa”.
Y muy importante: se coherente en redes con lo que dices en la entrevista. La incoherencia es lo que tira para atrás a más de la mitad de los empleadores.
LA IMPORTANCIA DE UNA MARCA FUERTE EN REDES
Aunque un 36% de los reclutadores creen que los candidatos no trabajan bien en su marca personal, “hay más rechazo, a que las personas no tengan una marca personal potente-explica la experta en recursos humanos- porque dices, oye, yo quiero un candidato que sí que tenga esa marca personal porque es la nueva forma, la nueva ágora donde se producen todas las conversaciones”. Y hay que ir construyendo esa marca poco a poco, no vale hacerlos en el último minuto, y ser muy activo en redes construyendo una “muy potente porque no solamente somos un currículo, sino somos todo lo que hacemos, tanto a nivel personal como a nivel profesional. Y de esto siempre nos acordamos de Santa Bárbara cuando llueve, cuando a uno a lo mejor le van a despedir, tiene sus redes sociales abandonadas y de repente se pone a publicar. Pues eso ahora mismo las empresas de selección también lo ven. Entonces, bueno, hay que ser activo. ¿Por qué hay que ser activo? Porque es esa imagen de lo que proyectamos, insisto, temas personales y temas profesionales porque es la coherencia de la empresa”.
La autora de “Por qué necesitas un filósofo en tu empresa”, nos cuenta que ahora mismo hay una generación que lo ha entendido muy bien. Más que los milenial y que los boomers.

author: Michael Crowley,David E. Sanger,Farnaz Fassihi,Eric Schmitt
title: Israel appears ready to attack Iran, officials in U.S. and Europe say
text:
Israel appears to be preparing to launch an attack soon on Iran, according to officials in the United States and Europe, a step that could further inflame the Middle East and derail or delay efforts by the administration of U.S. President Donald Trump to broker a deal to cut off Iran’s path to building a nuclear bomb.
The concern about a potential Israeli strike and the prospect of retaliation by Iran led the United States on Wednesday to withdraw diplomats from Iraq and authorize the voluntary departure of U.S. military family members from the Middle East.
It is unclear how extensive an attack Israel might be preparing. But the rising tensions come after months in which Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel has pressed Trump to seize on what Israel sees as a moment of Iranian vulnerability to a strike.
topics: War, Conflict and Unrest->international military intervention

author: world today news
title: Discover the Magic V3 Honor: World's Thinnest Folding Smartphone Revealed!
text:
“`html
Honor Magic V3 Debuts as World’s Thinnest folding Phone
Honor Magic V3 Debuts as World’s Thinnest Folding Phone The Honor Magic V3 has officially entered the foldable phone market, making a significant impact with its sleek design and powerful performance. Touted as the world’s thinnest folding mobile, this device aims to seamlessly blend aesthetics with high-end functionality. Measuring a mere 9.2 mm when folded, the Magic V3 sets a new standard for slimness in the foldable category, while still packing a punch in terms of features and capabilities.The device is powered by the qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor and boasts remarkable screen technology, positioning it as a major contender in the premium mobile market.
Current Year
A New Contender in the folding Mobile Market The Honor Magic V3 is strategically positioned as a major competitor in the burgeoning foldable phone market. It offers a premium design coupled with flagship specifications and the latest technology, aiming to attract users who seek both style and substance in their mobile devices.The combination of a sleek form factor and powerful internal components makes the Magic V3 a compelling option for consumers looking to embrace the foldable revolution.
Design and Dimensions: Slim and Stylish One of the most prominent features of the Honor Magic V3 is its remarkably thin profile. When folded, the device measures just 9.2 mm, making it one of the slimmest folding cellphones currently available. This thinness does not compromise its functionality, as it still packs a powerful punch in terms of performance and features. The pursuit of thinness in foldable phones addresses a major criticism of earlier generations: bulkiness, making the Magic V3 a significant leap forward in engineering and design.
Weighing in at 226 grams, the Magic V3 strikes a balance between portability and usability. It’s substantial enough to feel premium, yet light enough to carry comfortably. The phone is available in several color options, including Velvet black, Snow, Tundra Green, and Red, catering to a range of aesthetic preferences. This variety ensures that users can select a device that aligns with their personal style.
screen Technology: Vibrant and Responsive The Honor Magic V3 boasts impressive screen technology on both its main and secondary displays. The main screen is a 7.92-inch Foldable LTPO OLED with a resolution of 2156 x 2344 pixels and a 120 Hz refresh rate , providing a smooth and immersive viewing experience. The secondary screen is a 6.43-inch LTPO OLED with a resolution of 1060 x 2376 pixels, also featuring a 120 Hz refresh rate. The high refresh rate on both the inner and outer displays is a significant feature, translating to smoother scrolling, more responsive gaming, and an overall more fluid user experience.
Brightness is another key feature, with the main screen reaching a peak brightness of 1,800 nit and the secondary screen reaching 2,500 nit. This ensures excellent visibility in various lighting conditions,from luminous sunlight to dimly lit environments. The bright displays ensure excellent visibility in various conditions, making it a versatile device for use both indoors and outdoors.
Performance: Power under the Hood At the heart of the Honor Magic V3 is the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 gen 2 processor, known for its high performance and efficiency. This powerful chipset ensures smooth operation for various applications and seamless multitasking. The phone comes with options for either 12 GB or 16 GB of LPDDR5 RAM,further enhancing its performance capabilities. The Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 is a top-tier processor, ensuring seamless multitasking and excellent performance for demanding apps and tasks.
Storage options are also generous, with variants offering 256 GB, 512 GB, and up to 1 TB of UFS 4.0 internal storage. This provides ample space for storing data, applications, and multimedia content. The ample storage options cater to users who store a lot of photos,videos,and other media on their devices.
Camera Capabilities: Capturing Every Detail The Honor Magic V3 is equipped with a versatile camera system designed to capture high-quality photos and videos. The rear camera setup includes a 50 MP (Wide) lens with an aperture of f/1.6, a 50 MP (Telephoto) lens with an aperture of F/3.0, and a 40 MP (Ultrawide) lens with an aperture of f/2.2. The triple-camera system, with a combination of wide, telephoto, and ultrawide lenses, offers versatility.
for selfies and video calls, the phone features two 20 MP front cameras, one on the main screen and one on the secondary screen. This ensures high-quality images nonetheless of which screen is in use. The dual front-facing cameras on the inner and outer displays provide great selfie capabilities irrespective of the device’s state – folded or unfolded.
Battery and Charging: power That Lasts The Honor Magic V3 is powered by a 5,150 mAh battery, designed to support all-day use. When it’s time to recharge, the phone supports 66W wired fast charging and 50W wireless fast charging, allowing for efficient and convenient power replenishment.
Additional Features: Connectivity and Security The Honor Magic V3 runs on Android 14 with the MagicOS 8.0.1 interface, offering a smooth and intuitive user experience. It supports Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.3, NFC, and USB Type-C 3.1 with DisplayPort 1.2 support,ensuring extensive connectivity options.
Security features include a fingerprint scanner located on the side for fast and secure access. The device also boasts an IPX8 certification for water resistance, providing added protection against accidental spills and splashes.
Pricing and Availability The Honor Magic V3 is currently available in the UK at a price of £1,699. Details regarding pricing and availability in Indonesia have not yet been officially announced.
With its combination of sleek design,powerful performance,and advanced features,the Honor Magic V3 aims to provide a premium folding mobile experience for users seeking both aesthetics and functionality.
Honor Magic V3: Is This the Future of Foldable Phones? Is the Honor Magic V3 truly a game-changer in the foldable phone market, or just another expensive gadget? To find out, we consulted with Dr.Anya Sharma, a leading mobile technology expert, to dissect this highly anticipated device.
World-Today-News.com (WTN): Dr.Sharma, the Honor Magic V3 is touted as the “world’s thinnest folding phone.” How critically vital is this achievement in the context of foldable phone evolution?
The pursuit of thinness in foldable phones is crucial.It directly addresses a major criticism of earlier generations: bulkiness. the Honor Magic V3’s remarkably slim 9.2mm folded profile represents a significant leap forward in engineering and design. This isn’t just about aesthetics; it directly impacts usability and pocketability. Remember the early days of clamshell phones? the initial models where bulky; subsequent iterations prioritized a slimmer form factor—improving user experience greatly. The Magic V3 demonstrates a similar evolutionary step for foldable devices. This thinness,without compromising functionality,is key to mass adoption. consumers are demanding sleek, portable devices, along with cutting-edge features.
Dr.Anya Sharma, Mobile Technology Expert
WTN: The phone boasts remarkable screen technology – a 7.92-inch main display and a 6.43-inch secondary display, both with 120Hz refresh rates.How does this compare to competitors and what are the practical implications for the user?
The high refresh rate on both the inner and outer displays is a significant feature. A 120Hz refresh rate translates to smoother scrolling, more responsive gaming, and an overall more fluid user experience. Compared to some competitors that might offer this rate only on the main display,the Magic V3 provides a consistent,high-quality visual experience irrespective of whether the phone is folded or unfolded. this consistency is a key differentiator and enhances overall user satisfaction. The bright displays, with peak brightness exceeding 1800 nits on the main screen, also ensure excellent visibility in various conditions, making it a versatile device for use both indoors and outdoors.
Dr. Anya sharma, Mobile Technology Expert
WTN: The qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor combined with ample RAM and storage options are undeniably powerful. How critical is this internal hardware for the success of a foldable phone?
The internal hardware is absolutely critical.Foldable phones typically demand more processing power then conventional smartphones due to their dual displays and the complex mechanisms involved in folding the screen. The Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 is a top-tier processor, ensuring seamless multitasking and excellent performance for demanding apps and tasks. Coupled with generous RAM options (12GB or 16GB), the Honor Magic V3 is well-equipped to handle the most resource-intensive applications without lagging. the ample storage options (up to 1TB) cater to users who store a lot of photos, videos, and other media on their devices. It’s truly a powerhouse under the hood.
Dr. Anya Sharma, Mobile Technology Expert
WTN: The camera system is quite impressive. Can you elaborate on its key features and how it compares to the competition?
The triple-camera system, with a combination of wide, telephoto, and ultrawide lenses, offers versatility. The inclusion of both 50MP wide and telephoto lenses ensures high-quality images across a range of scenarios and distances.Moreover,the dual front-facing cameras on the inner and outer displays provide great selfie capabilities irrespective of the device’s state – folded or unfolded.The quality of the cameras is very critically important for many consumers. While specifics can vary across diffrent brands and models, the Honor Magic V3’s camera system appears to be very competitive in the current foldable phone landscape.
Dr. Anya Sharma, Mobile Technology Expert
WTN: What are some of the key differentiating features of the Honor Magic V3 that set it apart from other foldable devices on the market?
Honor Magic V3: Unfolding the Future of Foldable Phones? Is the Honor Magic V3 poised to revolutionize the foldable phone market, or is it simply another high-priced gadget? Let’s delve into the details with Dr. Anya Sharma, a leading expert in mobile technology.
World-Today-News.com (WTN): Dr. Sharma, the Honor Magic V3 is marketed as the “world’s thinnest folding phone.” How notable is this achievement in the broader context of foldable phone evolution?
Dr. anya Sharma: The pursuit of thinness in foldable phones is paramount. It directly addresses a major drawback of earlier generations: bulkiness. The Honor Magic V3’s remarkably slim 9.2mm folded profile represents a considerable advancement in engineering and design. This isn’t merely about aesthetics; it substantially impacts usability and portability. Consider the early clamshell phones; the initial models were bulky, and subsequent iterations prioritized a slimmer form factor—dramatically improving user experience. The Magic V3 demonstrates a comparable evolutionary leap for foldable devices. This thinness, without sacrificing functionality, is key to widespread adoption. Consumers increasingly demand sleek, portable devices alongside cutting-edge features. The achievement speaks volumes about advancements in material science and miniaturization within the mobile industry sector.
WTN: the phone boasts remarkable screen technology—a 7.92-inch main display and a 6.43-inch secondary display, both with 120Hz refresh rates. How does this compare to competitors, and what are the practical implications for the user?
Dr. Sharma: The high refresh rate on both the inner and outer displays is a critical feature. A 120Hz refresh rate results in smoother scrolling, more responsive gaming, and a generally more fluid user experience. Compared to competitors that might offer this rate only on the main display, the Magic V3 provides a consistent, high-quality visual experience whether the phone is folded or unfolded. this consistency is a key differentiator and significantly enhances user satisfaction. The luminous displays, with peak brightness exceeding 1800 nits on the main screen, also ensure excellent visibility in various conditions, making it a versatile device for both indoor and outdoor use. The dual displays and high refresh rates truly enhance productivity and entertainment capabilities.
WTN: The qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, combined with ample RAM and storage options, is undeniably powerful. How significant is this internal hardware for the success of a foldable phone?
Dr. Sharma: Internal hardware is absolutely critical. Foldable phones typically demand more processing power than conventional smartphones due to their dual displays and the complex mechanics of folding the screen. The Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 is a top-tier processor, ensuring seamless multitasking and excellent performance even for demanding applications. Coupled with generous RAM options (12GB or 16GB), the Honor magic V3 is well-equipped to handle resource-intensive applications without lag. The ample storage options (up to 1TB) cater to users who store a lot of photos, videos, and other media on their devices. It’s a true powerhouse under the hood, vital for a positive user experience within a sophisticated foldable device.
WTN: The camera system is quite impressive. Can you elaborate on its key features and how it compares to competing foldable devices?
Dr. Sharma: The triple-camera system, featuring a combination of wide, telephoto, and ultrawide lenses, offers considerable versatility. The inclusion of both 50MP wide and telephoto lenses ensures high-quality images across a range of scenarios and distances.Furthermore, the dual front-facing cameras on the inner and outer displays provide excellent selfie capabilities regardless of whether the device is folded or unfolded. The quality of the cameras is very important to many consumers. While specifics vary across brands and models, the Honor Magic V3’s camera system appears highly competitive within the current foldable phone landscape. This advanced camera technology ensures that images and videos captured are of high definition and have excellent colour and detail even in low-light conditions.
WTN: What key differentiating features of the Honor Magic V3 set it apart from other foldable devices on the market?
Dr. Sharma: The Honor Magic V3 distinguishes itself through a compelling combination of factors: its remarkably thin profile, the high refresh rate on both displays ensuring a consistent user experience, the powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor guaranteeing smooth performance and multitasking, and the versatile triple-camera system delivering high-quality photos and videos. Furthermore, the phone’s robust battery life and fast-charging capabilities enhance its overall practicality. These elements, when considered together, elevate the device above many of its competitors.
WTN: Dr. Sharma, what is your overall assessment of the Honor Magic V3’s potential impact on the foldable phone market?
Dr. Sharma: The Honor Magic V3 represents a significant step forward in foldable phone technology. Its focus on thinness, powerful performance, and high-quality displays addresses many of the shortcomings of previous generations. While the price point is substantial, the phone’s innovative features and sophisticated design position it as a compelling option for users seeking a premium foldable experience. While the long-term impact remains to be seen, the device undoubtedly presents a strong argument for the future of this rapidly evolving technology.
What are your thoughts on the Honor Magic V3? Share your opinions and insights in the comments below!

author: @httweets
title: Tech layoffs: Dell says job cuts will continue for cost control and profitability concerns - Hindustan Times
text: Dell Technologies Inc. will continue to reduce its workforce this year, trying to control costs amid concerns that demand for PCs hasn’t rebounded and sales of servers optimized for artificial intelligence aren’t as profitable as other products.Dell said a limitation on outside hiring, job reorganizations and other actions will produce “continued reduction in our overall headcount” in the fiscal year ending in February 2025.Also Read: What was the key to Bill Gates' and Microsoft's success? He says it was his focus on…The company is focused on expanding the business of selling high-powered servers for artificial intelligence work. This new spigot of growth has excited investors — the stock has gained 39% this year through Tuesday’s close and will join the S&P 500 Index later this month.Still, there is increasing concern about the profitability of the equipment sold by Dell and peers such as Super Micro Computer Inc. and Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. because the servers need expensive computer chips made by companies like Nvidia Corp. In the most recent quarter, Dell said that a higher mix of AI servers hurt margins, but reported improved profit compared with the previous period.Also Read: Evergrande fraud: China imposes record penalty on PwC for audit lapsesThe company’s better-known business, the sale of personal computers, hasn’t picked up as much as anticipated after a two-year slump. Dell on Aug. 30 reported $12.4 billion in fiscal second-quarter revenue, down 4% from the same period a year earlier and slightly missing estimates. Sales of business PCs was little changed while revenue from consumer-oriented PCs declined 22% from a year earlier.“We remain committed to disciplined cost management in coordination with our ongoing business transformation initiatives and will continue to take certain measures to reduce costs,” Dell said Tuesday in a regulatory filing.The company declined to comment beyond the filing.In June, Dell cut jobs primarily in sales without disclosing how many workers would be affected. The company took a $328 million charge for severance expenses in the quarter. Dell said in February that it had about 120,000 full-time workers globally.Also Read: New PM E-DRIVE scheme offers ₹ ₹10,000 subsidy for EV 2-wheelers and ₹50,000 for EV 3-wheelers

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Iran frees all 16 Indians onboard ship seized off Strait of Hormuz
text:
Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amirabdollahian has said that the country has released all the crew members of the Israeli-linked ship which was seized recently by Iran's Revolutionary Guards in the Strait of Hormuz.
The development comes weeks after the Portuguese-flagged ship was seized by IRGC on April 13. The ship, MSC Aries, was manned by a crew of 25, of which 17 were Indians. However, over 16 crew members remain onboard at present after the sole woman, Ann Tessa Joseph, was released on April 18by Iranian authorities.
Amirabdollahian said the release of the crew was a humanitarian act and
they could return to their countries along with the ship's captain. But, the control of the vessel will remain with Iran under judicial detention.
The Ministry of External Affairs had earlier said the return of the Indian crew was dependent on several factors, including their contractual obligations. "All of them are in good health. We are in touch with Iranian authorities also for their release," MEA spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal said when asked about the fate of the 16 sailors.
According to Iran, the seized ship had turned off its radar in Iran's territorial waters and jeopardized the security of navigation.
Meanwhile, Iran-backed militia Houthis continue to target merchant ships taking the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden, forcing the ships to pass through the Indian Ocean.
Many shipping companies have switched to a longer route to avoid Houthi attacks on the approaches to the Suez Canal in the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden. However, Houthis began extending their target area hundreds of miles out in the Indian Ocean. Last month, a merchant vessel MSC Orion was attacked by a drone when it was some 600 kilometers (375 miles) off the coast of Yemen. This was the first confirmed deep-sea assault claimed by the Houthis.
The attack raised questions about how the Houthis could have carried out an assault hundreds of kilometres (miles) from the shores of Yemen on a moving target. Their primary area of attack so far has been in the Red Sea, the Gulf of Aden and the narrow Bab el-Mandeb Strait that connects the two waterways key for international trade. Those are close to Yemen's shoreline, unlike the site of the MSC Orion attack.
The Houthis are not known to operate an expeditionary naval fleet, nor do they have access to satellites or other sophisticated means of controlling long-distance drones.

author: Dheepthi OJ
title: 80 per cent drain desilting work complete: Vellore Municipal Corporation
text:
VELLORE: With the northeast monsoon expected to set in Tamil Nadu in the third week of October, Vellore Municipal Corporation Commissioner P Janaki Raveendran has said that 80 % of stormwater drain desilting work in the city is complete.
Speaking to TNIE, she said, “Around 80% of stormwater drain desilting works have been completed. Before the northeast monsoon sets in, we will completely desilt all stormwater rains. I have asked the staff to clear blockages in drainages as well.”
Regarding low-lying areas like Muthamizh Nagar, VG Rao Nagar and Bharathi Nagar getting flooded because of the water from Katpadi Railway Station entering it, she said that the civic body held a joint inspection with the Railways and a solution would be arrived. “As of now, sandbags have been placed to prevent movement of water to low-lying areas,” she said.
The electricity department has also started precautionary measures to face the monsoon. An official from the department said that in the past few weeks, they replaced damaged and sagging electricity cables and trimmed tree branches that were blocking electric wires.
“We have also formed a 15-member team under a nodal officer to respond to monsoon damages. We are also arranging private crane vehicles to quickly remove any fallen electric utility poles,” she said.
